entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fisher Branch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fisher Branch 12:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -28.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.6°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
